name: TacticTrainerFree
description:
Chess Tactic Trainer Free is one of the best mobile games of chess simulator available to owners of the iPhone, with a high rating and a large number of downloads in the App Store.

Classic interface has absorbed the best traditions of the game. Our unique tips and tactical advice will help you solve over 20k tactical chess problems.
Playing chess has never been so easy!

FEATURES:
- The range of difficulties from trivial to professional.
- Ability to track performance via statistics and graphs.
- More than 20k tactical chess problems are provided to be solved
- Compatible with iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch.
